paper_keywords: Expected Value of a Fuzzy Number
paper_abstract: This paper develops several expressions to quantify claim provisions to account in financial statements of a non-life insurance company under the hypothesis of a fuzzy environment. Concretely, by applying the expected value of a fuzzy number and the more general concept of value of a fuzzy number to the ANOVA claim predicting model [2] we estimate claim reserves to account in insurer's balance sheet and income account.
paper_title: Fuzzy Claim Reserving In Non-Life Insurance
